media.credit: The Correspondence of Baron de Vioménil

text.headline: The Correspondence of Baron de Vioménil Timeline
text.text: The Correspondence of Baron de Vioménil Project is part of an effort at the George Washington Presidential Library at Mount Vernon to transcribe and translate the manuscript papers of Vioménil, a French officer who served during the American War for Independence. It has been generously funded by the Richard Lounsbery Foundation.
